name: ⌚ Shazam Band
description:
Meet Shazam band,
Made for music events, Shazam Band allows you to put your phone away while making sure you never miss a song.

I’ve been working with Jérôme Konieczka on this project for several months now. Starting with a simple idea: as a music lover, my main use case on my Apple Watch has been the use of the Shazam app while listening to music. I’ve been wondering why such feature couldn’t be materialized at a more affordable price. That’s why we’ve designed this smart band, keeping discretion and simplicity to a $49 price point.

We hope you enjoy this project as much as we’ve enjoyed working on it!
